The Insurance Institute for Highway Safety and others have questioned whetherbanning texting behind the wheel orusing a hand-held cell phone reduces traffic accidents. Ray LaHood responded Thursday by saying, there are some who would like to derail our work spotlighting the dangers of texting or talking on the phone while driving. I want them to know that our fight to end distracted driving will not be deterred. Ray LaHood has been on a self-described`` rampage'' on the issue in the wake of harrowing stories of motorists killed by drivers who were texting or talking on a phone. The move is an example of Steve Ballmer 's commitment last year that the company is`` all in'' on cloud computing. This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version, and I think that really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud, Steve Ballmer said in a statement.
